IP address or hostname of the direct Oll: IP address or hostname of the direct Ollama server (for status monitoring).
Port of the direct Ollama server (defaul: Port of the direct Ollama server (default: 11434).
IP address or hostname of the OpenWebUI: IP address or hostname of the OpenWebUI server.
API Key for OpenWebUI authentication (Be: API Key for OpenWebUI authentication (Bearer Token). Get it from Settings > Account in OpenWebUI.
Timer to check model availability via di: Timer to check model availability via direct Ollama connection. Set to 0 to disable.
Check if Ollama model is running: Check if Ollama model is running
Timer to check if the Ollama model is ru: Timer to check if the Ollama model is running. Set to 0 to disable.
Use Qdrant as vector database for Ollama: Use Qdrant as vector database for Ollama.
IP address or hostname of the Qdrant ser: IP address or hostname of the Qdrant server.
Model to use for generating embeddings.
Maximum number of context results to inc: Maximum number of context results to include in queries.
Allow AI models to control ioBroker data: Allow AI models to control ioBroker datapoints via function calls.
Allow AI models to automatically change: Allow AI models to automatically change datapoints based on their responses (e.g., 'Martin ist jetzt anwesend').
If enabled, AI models can automatically: If enabled, AI models can automatically change this datapoint's value based on their responses.
Select the data type for this datapoint.
